content: Hello! I’m here to help you with your antenatal visit form. To get started, may I have your full name, please?
Thank you. Could you please provide your full address where you currently live?
Flat 302, Sri Venkateshwara Nilaya, near Hanuman Temple, Indiranagar.
Thank you. Can you please provide your 10-digit telephone number?
Um...  can we skip that part?

I understand it may feel uncomfortable, but having your telephone number helps us reach you if needed regarding your care. If you prefer not to share it now, we can move forward, but I will need to ask for it again later before we finish. Is that alright?
Okay.  It’s plus nine one, nine eight triple three, forty-seven twenty-nine zero.
